data.name: RPG Maker MV - Japanese School Girls Vol.4
data.detailed_description:
Introducing Japanese School Girls Vol. 4, a brand new sound pack from creator TK Projects. This latest volume includes 244 total tracks that represent sounds from a number of emotions and expressions. This pack will enable creators to add new Japanese school girl sound effects to their characters in situations of anger, sorrow, joy, greetings, shyness, shock and much more! If your characters are in need of a voice or expression for the story you're telling, then be sure to check out this pack today!

Features:

* 244 voice phrases, saying and clips.
* Many emotions / situations and common every-day phrases included
* .M4A and .OGG format included.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

data.short_description: Add more female voices to your game! Japanese School Girls Vol.4 brings you a big and varied collection!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
